{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AMX |model=NXA-WAP250G |revision= |upc=752423102341 |ean= |asin=B00DTVFN5O |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/06/2006 |manuf_country=China,Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=SAP2315A |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=CWU-WAP250G |ic_id=5078A-WAP250G |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P32V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks;5.4.2; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=AMX |default_ssid_regex=^AMX$ |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=1988 |oui=00:12:CF |oui_eth=00:12:CF }} ''802.11b/g Wireless Access Point''
[http://www.amx.com/products/NXA-WAP250G.asp Product page]
[http://www.amx.com//assets/manuals/NXA-WAP250G.OperationReferenceGuide.pdf Operation/Reference Guide] The default SSID is '''AMX'''. The FCC manual states the model is SAP2315A, the default IP is 192.168.1.20, the default credentials are admin:, and the default SSID is '''Skype Zones'''. ==Additional external links== *[http://james.slaterspage.com/hacking-the-amx-nxa-wap250g-access-point-with-a-raspberry-pi/ Hacking the AMX NXA-WAP250G with a Raspberry Pi on ''James Slater'''s blog] :AP51 board, 4MB Flash, 16MB RAM :"P/N: 141231520000E"... appears to be silkscreened on the board.
